html.p: Proposition. If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] are [mathjaxinline]n\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrices which are both invertible, then [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] is invertible, and [mathjaxinline](AB)^{-1}= B^{-1}A^{-1}[/mathjaxinline].

Proposition. If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] are [mathjaxinline]n\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrices, and their product [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] is invertible, then both [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] are invertible.
